This course will be lectured in English. The course introduces diffusion, mass transfer, and related unit operations, including 
1. Diffusion and diffusion coefficient
2. Mass transfer in unit operations
3. Diffusion coupled with reactions or heat transfer
schedule:
01. Models for diffusion and diffusion in dilute solutions
02. Diffusion in concentrated solutions
03. Dispersion
04. Diffusion coefficients
05. Fundamentals of mass transfer
06. Theories of mass transfer
07. Absorption
08. Differential distillation
09. Staged distillation
10. Extraction
11. Adsorption
12. Diffusion coupled with heterogeneous reaction
13. Diffusion coupled with homogeneous reaction
14. Diffusion coupled with heat transfer
